name: Ashely Lips
text: I love this location. The staff here are very friendly and take the time to make my order right. Thank you for working so hard and doing everything right. I will keep coming back to this location.

name: Mo Johnson
text: Food was delicious. Service friendly. There was just a bit of a wait . Typical Pizza Hut flavors and melty cheese

name: Josephine Breeden
text: There was only a couple slices of pizza when we arrived. Decided at one point to get some bread sticks while we waited for more pizza but they were so hard you could tell they had been on the buffet for awhile. That's at least what I …More

name: Rambo 2x
text: Good pizza, we order like 3 4 times a month

name: Grn Lantern
text: The buffet (Mon thru Fri) is hard to beat if you like pizza and salad for $5.99!!  Drink is an additional $1.99.

name: Jeff Kronewitter
text: Always friendly service and excellent pizza and wings

name: Nathan GM
text: Food was good, but inside was confusing and not set up well for ordering.

name: Regi Hinton
text: All you can eat buffet weekdays.  Pan crust!!  Offered a free drink while I waited on my order.  Military discount of 10%

name: Helleborne
text: The customer service at this location is in point. Even if there is an issue, they are quick, polite, and professional. Love these guys!

name: Paul Black
text: Nice salad bar, and a decent lunch buffet.Good atmosphere, and a clean dining room.  Service was friendly and inviting. Will be back again!

name: Michelle Brubacher
text: We were promptly  greeted and seated an helped food was hot and good.

name: Anthony Marro
text: This is the most disgusting pizza place in the world.. we tried this place twice and both was disgusting.. other pizza huts are great but this one tastes disgusting as well as looks disgusting in the inside. It was so bad little ceasers tastes more like pizza. Save your money and go get a $5 hot and ready.. never go back

name: Shelby Galbo
text: So I arrived and stood at the desk to be seated around 10 mins. The waiter was unprofessional. I ordered a Hawaiian p'zone, this dude brought out a whole large pizza!!!

name: Crae Gibson
text:
My favorite pizza place. Has a nice pizza
bar at lunch. Very reasonable . i like their
Specials . salads are good also. Can be crowded at lunch. Usually i order to go on
evenings

name: Steven Lewchuk
text: Great service food good

name: MICHAEL BROM
text: Had lunch their yesterday and the pizza was awful, the sauce is what made it taste the way it did, just couldn’t eat it. Thank goodness for the salad bar

name: Wayne Mangiardi
text: Horrible customer service!!! Beyond Horrible!!! Hire new employees!!

name: brittany bozarth
text: Went there Sunday night and was very disappointed. Waited 15 minutes or more to be seated. When we were finally acknowledged the server said sit wherever and I will be right with you. We waited at least 15 more minutes to have our drink …More

name: OoSeanoO
text: Fast friendly service. Always treated like family when I visit.

name: ron swanson
text: I stopped eating at this particular location approximately 2 years ago due to my order constantly being wrong.  Decided to give them one more chance and made a SIMPLE order for one large pizza . Picked up order and did not look in box …More

name: Jennifer McKenzie
text: Online it says the lunch buffet is till 3pm. We walked in well before 3pm...before 2pm actually and although their buffet was not only full of food, the lady said they were closing it down and going to throw all the food in the trash.

name: Dell Ledbetter
text: Very good and very friendly

name: erich patton
text: Great food and great service

name: Roy Montgomery
text: Clean , friendly people. Has a lunch buffet with a saladbar all u can eat for $5.99. Great food

name: Dobie Lawrence II
text: Friendly service, one of the only buffets left. And for 5$, can't beat it. They will make a pizza for you as well.

name: Adita Medina
text: It's fine, but they should have more variety. but for the price it's fine.

name: Terry Stephenson
text: The lunch buffet for 4.99 cant be beat. Very friendly courteus staff and fresh pizzas

name: Monique Burrus
text: Their lunch buffet was great. So many varieties of pizza and a great salad bar

name: Fantasy Borah
text: Food was cold and had a hair in one pizza.

name: Mark Boggan
text: No more bbq pizza.  That still doesnt stop the fact that everything was delicious

name: john wilds
text: Got some wings from here and got a 24 count. They must of been running out or something cause 10 of the 24 were very small. A couple not even a quarter size of what they should be. So i believe I paid for 24 but only got about 15-16 if you put small ones together.

name: Logan Moore
text: Ordered 2 pizzas and a box of mini cinnibuns and they took 20 mins to make them with noone else in the store. Good food though.

name: CL STRONG
text: The employee are very nice  Courteous!!

name: Roger Colwell
text: Not what it used to be.  Only 3 employees working lunchtime, so slow service and unable to keep any clean tables.  Food was still fine.

name: Chasidy Murray
text: Great food good service #Buffetnight

name: Roy Montgomery
text: Good pizza great salad bar great place to eat

name: kerry lehmberg
text: Food always good

name: Andree Smiles
text: Pizza was hot, fresh and delish. Waitress was very kind, and only waitress for the whole restaurant.

name: Duane Beechum
text: Great and fast friendly service! Excellent selection! Awesome atmosphere! Family friendly

name: Larry Russell Lipscomb Jr
text: Freshly placed pizzas,and lots of themw

name: Louis Carter
text: Excellent lunch buffet

name: Katie Cook
text: Went here for lunch around 12:20, they were not that busy but it still took almost 10 mins to get a drink and silverware. They didn't put much out at all and the salad bar was left without lettuces almost the whole time I was there. To top …More

name: Fred Morris
text: Server was nice and pizza hot

name: Peyton S. Bennett
text: Not to sure but find it has went down since new management. And rude service!! I asked 3 times for a drink refill at the end of witch never got!! And was welcome with a eyeroll and a ugh bc I handed her 3 dollars... I won't return again!!

name: Anthony Shepheard
text: Some staff members were rude. Buffet was not worth the price. Salad bar not filled, pizzas were left out for too long on the buffet and had gotten hard. Saving grace was when the shift leader on duty asked if there was anything we wanted on the buffet.

name: Michael Benson
text: Came in there where two maybe three customer in hole restaurant, and every table was dirty. Had to wait 10 minutes for table. I had the buffet but no pizza on it. Finally pizza came out did not taste good.

name: Shirley Collins
text: Good, but just long wait

name: Matty Ice
text: Best cheat meal spot

name: Lillianne Borzik
text:
I think their Pizza is Amazing!!!!
They could work on their service sometimes.
Wifi also only works when there is nobody here.

name: Howard Jr
text: Never a bad experience here

name: Matty Paulk
text: The new garlic crust is amazing

name: Tony Snyder
text: Love me some Pizza Hut and the (carryout only) $10 Anyway You Want It special! I'll call ahead and geta large pan super supreme image ready in 15 minutes or less. .. Mmm and don't forget The Garlic knots which are to die for!!

name: Alicia Gardner
text: Too much business, not enough workers. Waiter couldn't take our order for her name being screamed from back to pick up another pizza. Food was good though.

name: Donald Rodriguez
text: Pizza here is delicious and the service is very fast, no complaints to report .

name: Danielle Morton
text: Service can be slow but the food is great and even though service is slow the staff is very nice and pleasant

name: Desiree Drake
text: We enjoy it.  Nothing's wrong with Pizza Hut... Especially for a change

name: Jeffrey Hogan
text: Brought my youngest son out to eat lunch today. It's first time I've been here in years. Figured they've updated somethings but I was wrong. Still the same ole buffet with nothing on it and no enough pizza to serve everyone for a lunch rush. Foods was good as always but they could do an upgrade to the buffet line. Lordy!

name: Hank Pugliese
text: Quick friendly and reasonable

name: Jon Yancy
text: Driving through Mississippi and called them to pick up pizza. Asked the lady what exit to take to get to store. She couldn't tell me so she asked someone who told her to hang up on me. Called back and they hung up without answering. Called …More

name: Gini Hampton
text: Wouldn't serve the lunch buffet that was still full. It ended 2 minutes before we walked in... When we n stated what a waste of pizza. She says she feed her sheep!! After calling to complain they apparently  donate it to Feed my sheep a charitable organization !!! LOL she could've been more clear!

name: Samiya Martin
text: My favorite pizza hut. When the cook name will is there my meal is always on point!!! The real MVP .....#GiveThatManARaise

name: Justin Garrigues
text: Good pizza. Pan pizza is good.

name: James Linn
text: New type of cheese bread sticks. Really good.

name: April Major
text: I have not enjoyed Pizza Hut on Hwy 49 in Gulfport, MS in a long time.

name: Kymberly McKay

text: My order is ALWAYS late. I expect to wait about another hour after their expected delivery time.

name: Debra Dailey
text: The pizza is great!!!

name: Flyy Lady
text: Not good at all. Ordered pan but was a mixture of thin & handtossed with beaucoup butter on the bottom & very little marinara sauce on top. I was hesitant on ordering here since its been a min so must say I am Sooooo disappointed. Reminded me of little Caesars
